titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the silver anniversary of the Independent State of Western Samoa.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/27/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives: (1) commending the people of Western Samoa on the 25th anniversary of their independence; (2) congratulating the people of Western Samoa on maintaining strong ties with the people of American Samoa; and (3) expressing hope that the people of Western Samoa will continue their relationship with the Americans of the Pacific.
